root: ^Have you ever noticed how the Janitor for the first floor is more than just tech illiterate?
^I mean, he is old, he’s probably more used to a lack of technology.

c-0: ^Well, I feel bad for him struggling.
c-1: ^You’re right, we should be more grateful for the progress we’ve made.
c-2: ^I agree, it’s sweet in its own way!
g-0: ^It’s just one of the students actually brought in their game system, and he couldn’t even begin to use the controller.
^Hell, the one time they asked him to check the security cameras on the second floor, He couldn’t figure anything out...
